channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Related Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Related Posts

item.title: CVE-2021-24211|2024-08-03T19:21:18.808Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20related%20posts
item.description: The WordPress Related Posts plugin through 3.6.4 contains an authenticated (admin+) stored XSS vulnerability in the title field on the settings page. By exploiting that an attacker will be able to execute JavaScript code in the user's browser.
